lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Ok, for the next one let's clear the trap [b]before[/b] getting caught.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: I designed these single-use boltcutters to fit around your jaws.

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Just get close and [color=#44ddff]use an item[/color] (the T key) and select the boltcutters to clear the trap.

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: You can also use the boltcutters after getting snared to break free a little faster if you mess up!
